entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 340,338Chapters: 30/40Kudos: 864

Summary: ‚ÄúHave you ever heard of the butterfly effect?‚ÄùHe looked up and shook his head. ‚ÄúNo‚Ä¶ what is it?‚Äù‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it‚Äôs wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.‚ÄùHe nodded, that‚Äôs exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place‚Ä¶ then none of this would be happening.But fuck it, ‚Äòcaution‚Äô isn‚Äôt in his vocabulary.~~~UPDATES BIWEEKLY <3

entry.title: The Last Amber Sign: The Price of Survival
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,725Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 9

Summary: In the whispers of the resistance, they say the Linaje are immortal. That the Argents are invincible.But Derek Hale has seen his family‚Äôs blood spilled, and the truth is something else.Now, he leads a group of rebels on desperate missions, challenging the shadows that rule the world. But everything changes when an encounter with a stranger ‚Äî a man who carries secrets more dangerous than death itself ‚Äî puts at risk something far more dangerous than an end: the chance to change the future.In a game where even magic costs more than any life, Derek will have to decide how far he‚Äôs willing to go to destroy the Argent regime... and how much he‚Äôs willing to sacrifice to save himself and humanity.

entry.title: I Hated You!
entry.summary:
Author: Unknown_Hoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,630Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 124

Summary: Mieczyslaw Stilinkski, or as most called him Stiles, was adopted by a sheriff and his wife in Beacon Hills, and with that, most of his past vanished. That was until his mother Claudia died when he was eight, and Noah Stilinkski decided it was time to dig up the past and put it together to give it to Stiles later. Stiles uncovered this when he turned seventeen, and he was almost killed again.Stiles had been given the documents that his father had been able to put together. Learning his real name, he was shocked that his mother kept his first name, but his last name was completely foreign, and it seemed like home. Mieczyslaw Mikaelson seemed like home; of course, he still loved his father even after knowing he was his adoptive father. After taking time to swallow the pills of his past, Stiles ran to tell Scott and Derick about the new information he had learned about his life.

entry.title: Inch by Inch
entry.summary:
Author: SirenAlpha

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,612Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 546

Summary: When Scott had sworn Allison had freed Erica and Boyd, Stiles had assumed that would mean they would show up at school again. When they didn't, she thought figuring out what had happened to them would only involve asking Isaac about it, a simple one step plan.A one step plan that spiraled into a massive research project trying to track Erica and Boyd down and give Derek every advantage he could get against the latest supernatural threat: a pack of alphas.
